subject: Baseball

Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Now with his fourth team in five seasons, Reyes is facing the Mets, his first club and the one that now has exactly what he wants: a shot at the postseason.
snippet: Now with his fourth team in five seasons, Reyes is facing the Mets, his first club and the one that now has exactly what he wants: a shot at the postseason.
